content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: spectral_arrow
inventory=[{"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "tnt_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "jungle_stairs", "quantity": 12, "index": 23}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "written_book", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 10, "index": 34}, {"type": "lily_pad", "quantity": 23, "index": 39}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 9, "index": 41}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 47, "index": 44}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft spectral arrows, I need to place glowstone dust, arrow, and glowstone dust in a T shape. I will move the glowstone dust from slot 12 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spectral_arrow
inventory=[{"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "tnt_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "jungle_stairs", "quantity": 12, "index": 23}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "written_book", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 10, "index": 34}, {"type": "lily_pad", "quantity": 23, "index": 39}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 9, "index": 41}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 47, "index": 44}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: I need to place the second glowstone dust in slot 4, to the right of the first glowstone dust.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "tnt_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "jungle_stairs", "quantity": 12, "index": 23}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "written_book", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 10, "index": 34}, {"type": "lily_pad", "quantity": 23, "index": 39}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 9, "index": 41}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 47, "index": 44}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to place the arrow in slot 5, to the right of the first glowstone dust.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 5 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "tnt_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "jungle_stairs", "quantity": 12, "index": 23}, {"type": "written_book", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 10, "index": 34}, {"type": "lily_pad", "quantity": 23, "index": 39}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 9, "index": 41}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 47, "index": 44}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
